summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingAnua Rice Enzyme Brightening Cleansing Powder is a multi-purpose cleanser to use as a wash-off and cleanser. Enriched with Rice Powder, Alpha-Arbutin and Ceramides for brighter skin complexion.
details: DetailsBenefitsA multi-purpose powder cleanser for brighter skin compexionFor bright glowy skinFragrance-freeFree Of: Alcohol / Parabens / Artificial Color / Silicones / Sulfates / Mineral Oil / Methylchloroisothiazolinone / Methylisothiazolinone / NutsKey IngredientsRice Powder and Extract: Helps even out skin texture including mild bumps on the skinAlpha-Arbutin: Helps with uneven skin tone and overall brighter complexionCeramides: Doesn't strip skin and keeps the skin hydrated after cleansingLactic Acid: Gently exfoliates the skin surfaceResearch Results20% improvement in dead skin cell removal immediately after use98% improvement in pore waste cleansingSuitable for acne-prone skin test completedSkin low-irritation test completedItem 2634192How To UseAs a wash-off maskStep 1: After cleansing, put 1 tablespoon amount of powder onto dry hands.Step 2: For mild exfoliation & even skin tone:Add 1 to 1.5 tablespoon amount of water, then mix and tap for unique elastic texture.For mild exfoliation & hydration:Add tablespoon of Rice 70 Glow Milky Toner and mix together.As a powder cleanserStep 1: On wet hands, put 0.5 tablespoon amount of powder.Step 2: Mix with the palm of your hands.Step 3: Once powder dissolves and forms foam, gently massage onto the face.Use as the second step of your double cleansing routine after using a cleansing oil.After your cleansing routine, use as a wash-off mask for mild exfoliation and hydration.Can be used every day, AM & PM.IngredientsZea Mays (Corn) Starch, Kaolin, Sodium Bicarbonate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Citric Acid, Sodium Polyacrylate, Diglycerin, Allantoin, Water, Maltodextrin, Papain, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Powder, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Lees Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Water, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ceramide NP, Ascorbic Acid, Alpha-Arbutin, Glucose, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Protease, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Tartaric Acid, Lactic Acid, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Seed Protein, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Caprylyl Glycol.
how_to_use: As a wash-off maskStep 1: After cleansing, put 1 tablespoon amount of powder onto dry hands.Step 2: For mild exfoliation & even skin tone:Add 1 to 1.5 tablespoon amount of water, then mix and tap for unique elastic texture.For mild exfoliation & hydration:Add tablespoon of Rice 70 Glow Milky Toner and mix together.As a powder cleanserStep 1: On wet hands, put 0.5 tablespoon amount of powder.Step 2: Mix with the palm of your hands.Step 3: Once powder dissolves and forms foam, gently massage onto the face.Use as the second step of your double cleansing routine after using a cleansing oil.After your cleansing routine, use as a wash-off mask for mild exfoliation and hydration.Can be used every day, AM & PM.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for a little over a week. I've only used it twice. I think it's great. It's kind of frothy when mixed with water, and it comes out of the container in the perfect amount, which I think is great no guess work needed. I need to purchase the toner to try with this. Great price too. Skin is soft and smooth. Overall clarity is bright. Pores look smaller and smoother. Highly recommend, ladies. Lee A

reviews.headline: Hard to wash off
reviews.comments: This creates a kind of film over your skin and makes it hard to wash off. I had to use another cleanser to get it off of my face.

reviews.headline: Use less than you think
reviews.comments: Product foams nicely. Non-drying and polishes for glass skin. Use less than you think.

reviews.headline: I would buy this productos again
reviews.comments: I've been using this rice exfoliating   I could feel how soft and smooth my skin became. It has a gentle texture, .It's now a must-have in my skincare routine!

reviews.headline: BUY THIS
reviews.comments: Seriously one of the best products i have EVER used. It brightened my skin after a couple uses and my skin feels absolutely silky smooth afterwards. I never write reviews but I completely stand by this product and would recommend it to anyone especially with dry skin.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Didn't notice any positive changes on my face.

reviews.headline: Very slimy
reviews.comments: I have tried other rice powder cleaners and wanted to try this one.  I did not like that it was very course and did not lather too much.  It was also very slimy and hard to rinse off.  It's a no for me.

reviews.headline: Will use again
reviews.comments: I have an uneven skin texture just from having dry skin (esthetician told me this) I was told this would be a good exfoliating product due to it exfoliating under the skin as well as on top. When I tell you i used this product and then as soon as i washed it off I immediately saw a hige difference. My face looked brighter. There was a very slight burn from it feeling dryer. But overall good product!

reviews.headline: Yes I will
reviews.comments: This as being my go to every night now and it's working.. it's additional to my Anua and am loving it. And I will say whatever reviews people gives you can still give it a try in my opinion cos whatever that not works for others might work well for you. Our body reacts to things differently

reviews.headline: incredible
reviews.comments: When I tell you everything breaks me out into a hive-y, fungal acne mess, I mean it with my whole heart. This stuff has been incredible. No reactions and my skin is definitely in a better state than before I used it. Also very fun to use! Face is soft, smooth and even calmer. Really love it and will repurchase back ups upon back ups. I don't want to be without it.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: First time trying but would repurchase! I have pretty sensitive skin and this didn't irritate my skin. It did cause some peeling a few days later but leaves my skin soft

reviews.headline: Bought this twice so far
reviews.comments: Good gentile exfoliating cleanser. Went to a facial and they recommended Dermalogica one. This one seems similar at a much more reasonable price. Since it's powder, I'm definitely bringing this on trips too.

reviews.headline: Burns!
reviews.comments: Beware if you have sensitive skin! Seriously burned my face and neck. Washed my face and neck with this stuff and got a rash on my face and neck that burned really bad. After 2 days of being inflamed and burning, my skin turned rough and leathery feeling wherever the rash was and still burns. I normally don't leave negative reviews but I also never had my skin react like this to a product before. Didn't want anyone else to experience this problem. Really has been quite painful so I recommend you use with caution if used at all.

reviews.headline: One of my favorite cleansers
reviews.comments:
The ANUA Rice Enzyme Brightening Cleansing Powder is a very unique type of cleansing face wash. Once you get the powder wet it then dissolves and becomes a more foamy type of cleanser. It leaves skin feeling instantly softer, due to the exfoliating properties it has, and makes skin instantly brighter and more glowing!
It quickly and easily removes any and all makeup, dirt, etc from the skin while cleansing. It even removes waterproof mascara easily!
I do want to note, that although this face cleanser does not irritate my skin (which is prone to being sensitive with certain products) , if I don't use some kind of moisturizer afterwards my skin does end up being pretty dry the following day! So DONT forget to use your moisturizers afterwards!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: My skin looked noticeably brighter after the first use. My skin looks smooth and feels soft. A little goes a long way—it turns into a nice creamy foam when water is added. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: So so good
reviews.comments: My skin is super glowy and my is softer than it has ever been. Highly recommend this product!

reviews.headline: Rice Enzyme Brightening Cleansing Powder
reviews.comments:
The Cleansing Powder was something completely new for me. It cleaned my face well without making it feel dry or tight. My skin felt smooth and soft afterward. Plus, since it's a powder, it's great for traveling—no worrying about spills or liquid restrictions.

"This review was collected as part of a promotion"

reviews.headline: ANUA Rice Enzyme Brightening Cleansing Powder
reviews.comments: My name is Gabby and I'm a licensed Cosmetologist. I received the Rice Enzyme Brightening Cleansing Powder. This powder to cleanser is super easy to use. Once mixed with water it reminds me of bean essence. I let it sit on my face for five minutes like a face mask. It gives your skin a slip and shine. I love the instant brightness and that it has a nice lather especially for my combination skin type. I like the compact packaging and that Anua products are reasonably priced. This cleanser pairs nicely with the Anua cleansing oil. Plus it's great to see the benefits of using rice on my skin as opposed to hair products. Using this is beneficial for evening out your skin tone. Overall, I would recommend this rice cleanser and give it five out of five stars.

reviews.headline: New to this formula, but I like it
reviews.comments: I'm partial to cleansing oil/ cream cleanser, so this took me for a surprise. However, I was pleasantly surprised. A little goes a LONG way as far as lather goes. The lather is rich but not slimy feeling and left my face really feeling clean. The scent wasn't overpowering either.

reviews.headline: Brighter smoother skin
reviews.comments: This rice brightening cleanser has been a great addition to my skincare routine. I've only seen a few products similar to this and I was excited to try it. The powder formula was very unique as it served as a cleanser and exfoliator in one. It has many great benefits for the skin. My skin felt a lot more smoother because of the exfoliating rice enzymes. It felt squeaky clean especially after a long day of wearing makeup. What I loved most is that it didn't dry out my skin. My skin actually felt more hydrated and soft after use. It's gentle enough for daily use or on days when your skin is feeling dull. I dispensed about a half teaspoon into my hands and it was the perfect amount to get a good lather and thoroughly cleanse my skin. And can I just say it gives me the perfect smooth skin for makeup application? No more dry patches of skin. This is definitely something I will be keeping in my routine.

faceoff_positive.comments:
It's out with the old and in with the new with this one. This compact product is glowness on the go! I love how the packaging is perfect for travel. I tend to overindulge when it comes to cleansing but a little bit of powder goes a long way. It emulsifies on impact and the product reminds me of dermalogica's microfoliant except the particles are sized bigger and the texture can feel a little bit more grainy on impact like a scrub. Making it the perfect dupe for a $60 product. Even though it is the same price as Dermalogica's Microfoliant mini, you are still getting more powder with Anua.

From the first use, my skin immideately looked less dull. I have been dealing with texture, acne flares, and added dryness thanks to the season, but using this cleanser allowed the rest of my products absorb easier. When pairing powder with the hydrating barrier serum I noticed an acne scar I had has been slowing fading. By adding an oil cleanser, radiance masks like Tata Harper or detox masks like Malin + Goetz, moisturizer i.e. La Roche Posay, and a sunscreen when needed; my skin has evened out significantly. I usually would add an undereye retinol alternative treatment to lighten the dark circles but I don't necessarily need it with this regimen.

I would recommend not using this product every day to avoid overexfoilating and overcleansing because it can disrupt your moisture barrier. I tested using this product everyday for a week and by day four, I noticed light irritation bumps. So this can be used as a midweek (3 days max) cleanser. To my understanding, if you plan on using this daily PLEASE be consistent with sunscreen as your skin will be more sensitive to sunlight. They even warn you on the box. Also, try double cleansing with this product for a deeper clean and luxuriously lush feel; your skin will feel like butter. There is not scent and if you are like me trying to fade hyperpigmentation and ingredients like Vitamin C causes heavy irritation, this is a product for you. 

After cleansing, I like that my skin doesn't feel tight or dehydrated instead it becomes the perfect bouncy base for my following products. My pores are also tighter.

Start the year off fresh with this Rice Enzyme Brightening Cleansing Powder!
faceoff_positive.headline: Fade it Out!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have likes and dislikes with the Anua Rice Enzyme Brightening Cleansing Powder. I love the rice enzyme base and the fact that it comes in a powder form. I like the brightening effect on my skin and the Ceramide complex. It also contains papain to help lightly exfoliate, my skin needs a light exfoliation every day so I thought this cleanser would be perfect for me. This cleanser is very hydrating and easy to use. I simply shake a little powder into my damp hands and lightly rub my hands together. If I need more water I will add a bit more to a few fingertips. I don't like that this product doesn't get very foamy like it claims. I've tried adding more water and less water and even whipping it with a fan brush. It just doesn't get foamy. It does get slimy. It felt like I was using a slimy cleanser on my skin. My skin did feel nice and clean after rinsing with water, but I don't think this is a cleanser I'd use often. Working in the beauty industry for over 20 years, I would recommend it to someone without texture issues and someone with drier skin. I like that this cleanser really isn't scented and I like the simplicity of the bottle it comes in. I also think it would be great for travel or in the gym/overnight bag.
faceoff_negative.headline: Anua Rice+Ceramide Cleanser
